hero.label: Success Stories
hero.title: Real Results from Real Partnerships
hero.description: See how we've helped organizations transform their operations, eliminate waste, and achieve measurable improvements.

stories.challenge: Delivery reliability for project materials to customer sites needed significant improvement, with supply chain decisions lacking the data-driven visibility to predict on-time performance.
stories.solution: LeanGo worked with Francisco Henriquez (VP Operations), Mick Kirby West (Supply Chain Manager), and their team to co-create and implement an MRP dashboard that predicts on-time delivery success and drives smarter inventory and supply decisions.
stories.quote: LeanGo integrated with our team and built a tool we actually use every day. The dashboard changed how we make supply chain decisions - we went from reacting to predicting.
stories.author: Francisco Henriquez, VP Operations

stories.challenge: Multiple important improvement initiatives needed to move faster, but the team lacked a structured system to accelerate and track progress across them all.
stories.solution: LeanGo worked with Dean Vukovic (VP Technology), Peggy Scott (Sprint Champion), and their team to co-create and implement an improvement sprint system that drives accountability and pace across initiatives.
results: 100+ improvement actions completed in first quarter
Structured sprint cadence adopted across teams
Clear ownership and accountability for every action
Visible progress across all key initiatives
stories.quote: The sprint system gave us a rhythm we never had before. Instead of talking about improvements, we're actually completing them - over a hundred in the first quarter alone.
stories.author: Dean Vukovic, VP Technology

stories.challenge: Traceability gaps across the supply chain made it difficult to leverage quality as a competitive advantage and build deeper customer confidence.
stories.solution: LeanGo worked with Paul Burke (VP Global Operations), Tom Lepovsky (VP Manufacturing), Scott Garland (Plant Manager), and their team to develop a cross-functional process map identifying quality gates and created a traceability dashboard spanning supply to customer use.
results: End-to-end traceability from supply to customer
Cross-functional quality gates identified and mapped
Business growth driven by onsite quality reviews
stories.quote: Quality used to be something we defended. Now it's something we sell. The traceability system LeanGo helped us build gave our customers a reason to grow with us.
stories.author: Paul Burke, VP Global Operations

stories.challenge: Equipment downtime was limiting capacity and driving up costs, with no system in place to predict wear part failures or centralize maintenance management.
stories.solution: LeanGo worked with Steve Schmitt (President), Pete Grill (Plant Manager), and their team to co-create a predictive wear part replacement system and implemented a centralized computerized maintenance management system for preventive maintenance and repair requests.
results: Predictive wear part replacement system in place
Centralized maintenance management for PMs and repairs
stories.quote: We stopped waiting for things to break. The system LeanGo helped us build lets us stay ahead of failures, and the uptime and capacity numbers speak for themselves.
stories.author: Steve Schmitt, President

stories.challenge: Trophy case order lead times were too long, and the team needed to be refreshed and prepared for future kaizen events.
stories.solution: LeanGo worked with Jay Kuhn (COO), Jeremy Leasure (CI Manager), and their team. We trained and supported the team on balanced process flow changes with point-of-use kanban material systems and 5S.
stories.quote: LeanGo didn't just improve the line - they re-energized our team. The results were immediate, and now our people have the skills and confidence to keep running kaizen events on their own.
stories.author: Jay Kuhn, COO
